data.Name: Rafael Wainhaus
data.staff_bio: Rafael is a member of the research team at the Institute for Community Inclusion, where he contributes to the Vocational Rehabilitation Research and Training Center (VR-RRTC) and Research and Technical Assistance Center (RTAC) projects as a study coordinator. Rafael holds a Master's degree in Social Work from the University of Vermont. He is an active volunteer with Vermont Adaptive Snow Sports as a Lead Adaptive Ski Instructor.
data.staff_ed:
B.A., Philosophy and Psychology, Green Mountain College
M.S.W., Social Work, University of Vermont
